sentences.sContent: But the microphone and chip in the device sample the incoming sound and produce an inverted wave that cancels out just the sound of the drill.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the microphone and chip in the device sample the incoming sound and produce an inverted wave that cancels out just the sound of the drill.
sentences.sCn: 但是，这种装置上的麦克风和芯片在收集接收到的声音后，就会发出一种反向声波，从而消掉钻牙的声音。

sentences.sContent: Since web users want instant gratification, the inverted pyramid style, as supported by Nielsen, is important for web writing and for better user experience.
sentences.sContent_eng: Since web users want instant gratification, the inverted pyramid style, as supported by Nielsen, is important for web writing and for better user experience.
sentences.sCn: 由于网络用户需要即时的满足，这种倒金字塔写作风格，对于网络写作和更好的用户体验是非常重要的。

sentences.sContent: This section describes a simple mechanism for creating an inverted text index by using index extensions.
sentences.sContent_eng: This section describes a simple mechanism for creating an inverted text index by using index extensions.
sentences.sCn: 本节描述一种简单的通过使用索引扩展创建反向文本索引的机制。

words.tran: 颠倒的事物；倒置物；倒悬者
换流器，[电子] 反相器；倒转者
使…转化；使…颠倒；使…反转；使…前后倒置

trans.tranCn: 颠倒（invert的过去分词）；使…反向
